title: Premium Study Planner
description: A visually stunning and highly interactive study planner designed for educational purposes with a premium look.

generation_hints.task_management: Implement task creation with fields for subject, due date, priority, and estimated time. Support task filtering by subject, date range, and completion status.
generation_hints.progress_tracking: Use recharts to visualize task completion rates over time, study hours per subject, and productivity trends. Display progress bars for weekly/monthly goals.
generation_hints.calendar_integration: Integrate react-big-calendar for visual schedule management. Support drag-and-drop for task rescheduling and color-coding by subject.
generation_hints.notifications: Implement reminder system for upcoming deadlines using browser notifications or in-app alerts.
